com.chupacadabra.evolution.util

Class JavaUtilRandomSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chupacadabra.evolution.util.JavaUtilRandomSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RandomSource

    public final class JavaUtilRandomSource
extends Object
implements RandomSource
    A simple random source based on Random.

    Instances of this class are safe for use by multiple threads.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

      Constructor.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double nextDouble()
      Get the next pseudo-random double, uniformly distributed in [0, 1).
      double nextGaussian()
      Get the next pseudo-random Gaussian (standard normal, i.e. normal with mean 0 and standard deviation 1).
      int nextInt(int n)
      Get the next psuedo-random integer, uniformly distributed in [0, n).
